- Sprite:
	- Position
	- Scale
	- Rotation
	- Anchor
	- image
	+ load
	+ render

- Scene:
	- renderer
	- childs
	+ add
	+ remove
	+ render

- Render:
	- scene
	- canvas
	- context
	+ getWidth
	+ getHeigth
	+ getCenter
	+ add
	+ render 
	+ zoom

- Graphic:
	- Position
	- Scale
	- Rotation
	- renderFunction
	- context
	+ line
	+ poligon
	+ strokePoligon
	+ rect
	+ strokeRect
	+ setStyle
	+ text
	+ strokeCircle
	+ Circle
	+ strokeArc
	+ render
